channel.title: Cryptography on Pascal Precht
channel.description: Recent content in Cryptography on Pascal Precht

item.title: On future-proof cryptographic hashes
item.description: Let’s talk about hashes. As mentioned in the resurrecting post about starting new, I’d like to document my learnings as I’m diving into projects that catch my attention in the decentralization space, such as IPFS. If you aren’t familiar with IPFS or haven’t heard of it, it’s basically a stack of (networking) protocols that enables a fully distributed file storage system to creates a faster, safer and more reliable web.
